title: Japan
additionalInfo: Japan seamlessly blends ancient traditions with cutting-edge technology. From Tokyo's neon-lit skyscrapers to Kyoto's peaceful temples and the natural beauty of Mount Fuji, Japan offers diverse experiences for every traveler.

title: Italy
additionalInfo: Italy is a treasure trove of art, history, and gastronomy. Explore Rome's ancient ruins, Florence's Renaissance masterpieces, Venice's romantic canals, and savor authentic pasta, pizza, and gelato throughout your journey.

title: New Zealand
additionalInfo: New Zealand is a paradise for outdoor enthusiasts. From the dramatic fjords of Milford Sound to the geothermal wonders of Rotorua and the picture-perfect beaches of the Bay of Islands, its diverse landscapes offer endless adventures.
